title: Tech Savy people please help! Looking to upgrade something that might improve my stream health!
body:
Okay so I'm trying to make my stream smoother. I am trying my best to figure out what I can upgrade to make things better. Does getting a better router or modem help? (I hard-line into my router currently)

Here is my problem:

Twitch bandwidth test:
http://i.imgur.com/Pal1aKa.png[/img]

My bandwidth seem low and I'm told the quality rating should be at around 80 to have a good stream. I want to know how I can improve this.

my Internet Speedtest:
http://i.imgur.com/TZKyOYm.png[/img]

Note: I should be getting 5 mbps upload so I don't know if their is something I should do to get more.  Paying for 60 down and 5 up. 

My Rig:
http://i.imgur.com/qdMZx6Z.png[/img]

My OBS settings: 
http://i.imgur.com/xBfhOE2.png[/img]

My router: 
https://www.amazon.com/NETGEAR-N600-Wi-Fi-Router-WNDR3400/dp/B0041LYY6K

My Modem:
https://www.amazon.com/Cisco-DPC3216-VCM-K9-DPC3216-EMTA-DOCSIS3-0/dp/B00TSKVBSI/ref=sr_1_1?s=electronics&ie=UTF8&qid=1498236097&sr=1-1&keywords=cisco+modem+dpc3216

I am a noob please help me.
